summary: The customer was having trouble understanding their Contoso Wireless bill and was looking for ways to reduce it. The agent offered the customer the Economy package which provides up to 5 Mbps download speeds and is perfect for light browsing and emailing, and is priced at $29.99 per month. Switching over to the Economy package should take effect within 24-48 hours of switching and the customer should start seeing the savings on their next monthly bill. There is nothing else that needs to be done on the customer's end.
